comments:
Build ID: I20070625-1500

Steps To Reproduce:
1.Team>Show History... on some file
2.Close project containing file.
3.Received NPE error dialog, and stack trace in log shown below.

Gave it a couple tries, but I wasn't able to recreate the
problem. But, since I got the stacktrace, thought I'd put
it out as a low priority bug.

More information:
!ENTRY org.eclipse.core.jobs 4 2 2007-07-30 13:51:56.152
!MESSAGE An internal error occurred during: "Fetching CVS revision history".
!STACK 0
java.lang.NullPointerException
	at org.eclipse.team.internal.ccvs.core.resources.EclipseFile.getLogEntries(EclipseFile.java:287)
	at org.eclipse.team.internal.ccvs.core.filehistory.CVSFileHistory.refresh(CVSFileHistory.java:98)
	at org.eclipse.team.internal.ccvs.ui.CVSHistoryPage$RefreshCVSFileHistory.run(CVSHistoryPage.java:1319)
	at org.eclipse.core.internal.jobs.Worker.run(Worker.java:55)
*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of bug 190434 ***
